General.Name: Semantix Inc.
General.Description: Semantix Tecnologia Em Sistema de Informacao S.A. provides consulting, training, and support for big data solutions, data science, enterprise search, machine learning, and Internet of things. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Estela, 96, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04011-001
